name: BetterPortals
author: kafeijao
description:
**__Features:__**
- Added `Drop Portal` button on user's details page
- Portals always drop, even when there's no surfaces available
- Display a timer with the seconds left until the portal closes
- Joining portals by walking on top of it
- Optionally require an input (`J` or `Trigger` press) to enter a portal
- Optionally get a notification for invisible portal drops (when they are dropped on top of you)

Check [README.md](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/BetterPortals) for more in-depth info.
